reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Electoral Institute for Sustainability of Democracy in Africa.- Supporting Open and Democractic Political Party sytems SADC REGION

description.narrative: The Project seeks to make specific interventions across the spectrum of different Political Parties in three countries in order to enhance the strength and Capacity of political parties as key players in an open society .EISA aims to do so by supporting the development pf Open democratic political parties systems as advocatedby the Political party Benchmarks developed by EISA and the Political Parties from across the African Continent..The project intervention are building the capacity of Women and y outh to participate more actively within palitical parties.supporting the implementation of PP Benchmarks which were developed and provide training and support to Political Prties in election poll watching
